Description_lang: Snakelike flames swirl around the player, inflicting $421228s1 Fire damage to them and radiating $@spellname429153 to nearby players every $s2 sec for $d. The flames tighten over time, increasing their damage as they reduce in area.$?diff14|diff17|diff15 [Upon expiration, the flames slither to another player.][]$?diff16 [$@spellname427201 triggers upon expiration.][]
